content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS [result]

--Identify inferred data types

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw''
    ) AS [result]
'

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) 
    WITH (
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        trip_type INT
    ) AS [result]
